OOC: Since noone is really in control of the base defenses, I'll move forward.

::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus' rockets struck the shield generator and the shields dropped, allowing Jhiaxus to pass. Just as he flew into the newly formed hull breach, Jhiaxus noticed a Maximal shuttle coming into the area.

Jhiaxus: So the game's a foot..

Once inside, Jhiaxus transformes to bot mode and draws his twin blasters. Jhiaxus starts running through the base, blasting the walls, looking for Windlord and Kup.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                  As the shuttle reached the base it took a lap around the site to scan
 for enemies.  It then moved a few clicks away from the base to a
 suitable landing site and landed with the front of the ship facing the
 base.
 
 OOC: Please tell me where the enemy is.
 
 On 5/27/07, xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
 > Windlord:
 >
 > Windlord answered dificulty "we're in cr's chambers, I'm ... wounded
 > and that nast y decepticon is around or almsot ready to come in...
 > follow my signal... the base is programed to allow all robot with
 > maximal or autobot signature come in... I dont know how long can we
 > resist.."
 >
 >
 > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
 > >
 > > The shuttle started to descend as it nears the maximal base.
 > >
 > > Pilot (radio): Pasificus Maximal 1 to Maximal base, do you read me?
 > > We are here to assist you.
 > >
 > > Meanwhile...
 > >
 > > "We dont need you to take any serious risks, we will protect you,"
 > > said Salveo to Nightlight.  "If anything bad happens, our comrades
 > > will come to our aid."
 > >
 >
 >
 >
